With the success of The Lego Movie back in 2014 the universe is expanding One of the standout characters in The Lego Movie was Lego Batman and here he is the main star and we get to know more about what his life is like when he s fighting crime and when he s not. Whether your a Batman fan or not I think you ll enjoy this movie A lot of the jokes in this movie were very fast paced and funny There are references to the past Batman movies and by address ing some of the flaws within those movies this becomes a satire that really works There s a Suicide Squad joke that I was surprised that they got away with ...). A lot of the humor is based on the flaws of the c haracter and the history of Batman. Let's face it Batman needs to stop being moody and mopey about the death of his parents It s been years Get over it Which is exactly what his butler Alfred him. You know the villains like Joker Harley Quinn and Bane I love how he always sounded like Tom Hardy here ). But do you know Calendar Man Egghead and Condiment King I know you re probably thinking Who ?" Exactly. The Batman and Joker they just love each other right This movie also address es that They need each other  . The Lego action scenes are al so real ly fun to observe Batman flips jumps and kicks to his awesome theme song that he made. Also it s not just a tongue and cheek comedy there are moments of drama involving Batman being unable to move on from the life that he has and unwilling to work with others Which is where Dick Grayson aka Robin comes in. But wow this movie was a blast from start to fin is h. It was fast paced full of jokes and references that ll please both Batman fans and the average movie going audience When you don t get a joke don t worry There s another one coming in a few seconds anyway When your Lego version of Batman has more personality and likability then the live action version t here's a huge problem DC get you r act together !!.
